mapper.insert: insert into user_membership (login_name, membership_id, expired_time, created_time, type, membership_give_id) value(#{loginName}, #{membershipId}, #{expiredTime}, #{createdTime}, #{type}, #{membershipGiveId})

INSERT INTO `aa`.`user_membership` (login_name, membership_id, expired_time, created_time, type, membership_give_id) VALUES
(#{item.loginName}, #{item.membershipId}, #{item.expiredTime}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.type}, #{item.membershipGiveId})
mapper.select: SELECT user_membership.* FROM (SELECT * FROM user_membership WHERE login_name = #{loginName} AND expired_time > now()) user_membership JOIN membership ON user_membership.membership_id = membership.id ORDER BY membership.level DESC LIMIT 1

select count(1) from user_membership join membership on user_membership.membership_id = membership.id where not exists (select 1 from user_membership other_user_membership join membership other_membership on other_user_membership.membership_id = other_membership.id where other_user_membership.id <> user_membership.id and other_user_membership.login_name = user_membership.login_name and other_membership.level > membership.level and other_user_membership.expired_time > now()) and user_membership.expired_time > now() and membership.level = #{level}
select * from user_membership where datediff(#{expiredDate}, expired_time) = 0
select * from user_membership where login_name = #{loginName} and type = #{type}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT MAX(m.level) AS level, login_name FROM user_membership u JOIN membership m ON u.membership_id = m.id WHERE expired_time > NOW() GROUP BY login_name ORDER BY level) membership WHERE level = #{level}
SELECT login_name FROM membership m LEFT JOIN (SELECT login_name, MAX(membership_id) AS membership_id FROM user_membership GROUP BY login_name) u ON m.id = u.membership_id WHERE m.level = #{level}
